name: VR - HillSide Tourist Roller Coaster
description:
Get a real sensation of 3d world with using ocular navigation and find yourself in an adventurous roller coaster. Real fun of VR Rio Roller Coaster 2016 begin when you wear your family pocket glasses to get a perfect magnification and rotation of 360 degree. Take a step into a real play land with adventure of cardboard virtual reality and get a real addiction of rolling over the slides with VR Rio Roller Coaster 2016 . No need to tap any trigger. Enjoy a fear free ride by tighten your seat belt.
Features
Realistic roller coaster.
VR glasses require.
Move your head to rotate your ride.
Experience ultimate adventure.
Enjoy a sensation of real 3d world.
Play in open space to get amazing navigation.
